channel.title: SLA on LPLUS Lab Home
channel.description: Recent content in SLA on LPLUS Lab Home

item.title: New publication on bilingual language acquisition
item.description: Another publication from the lab – this time on the acquistiion of generic and specific markers in bilingual French-English children. In collaboration with Coralie Herve at the University of Poiters, this work shows interesting effects of bilingual cross-linguistic interference as children work out the subtle differences between article usage in their two languages.

item.title: Publication
item.description:
Just out: “Testing the Interpretability Hypothesis: Evidence from acceptability judgments of relative clauses by Persian and French learners of L2 English”, a new article from Ehsan and Laurie.
Check it out at Second Language Research !
